batha bulathin sapiri agahingakamin thora isurumath rataka janathawage jiwana thaththwaya shakthimath karana diwi nanguma jathika wyaparaye hayawani adiyara elambaena 20 da aarambha kirimata siyalu katayuthu sanwidhana kara atha."isurumath niwahanak asirimath mawubimak" yanna themawa kara ganimin kriyathmaka mehi hayawani adiyara elambaena 20 sanduda perawaru 10.07 ta yedena subha mohothin nangenahira disawa bala janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage pradhanathwayen pala situwimen dipa wyapthawa aarambha kere.pawule aarthikaya saha poshanaya wadi diyunu karamin gruha aarthika eekaka wisipan lakshayak sawibala ganime diwi naguma 6wana adiyara eyata samangamiwa ratapura pradeshiya lekam kottasha 331kata ayath gramasewa wasam 14,022ka meya kriyathmaka kerena athara gruha aarthikaya godanagima thulin rate aarthikayata punarjiwayak labadima udesa diwi naguma prathama adiyara 2011 marthu masa aarambha kerini.

sewaka arthasadhaka aramudal sanshodhana panath ketumpatha mita swalpa mohothakata pera wadi chanda 59 n parlimenthuwe di sammatha wi thibe. adala panathata pakshawa chanda 71 k da wipakshawa chanda 12 k da himiwa atha. sabhanayaka,amathya nimal siripalada silwa mahatha wisin mema panath ketumpatha sabha gathakaranu labiya. mema panath ketumpatha ha bandunu sewa niyukthikayange wishrama watup prathilabha panath ketumpatha,widesha sewa niyukthikayange wishrama watup prathilabha panath ketumpatha ha wishrama watup anushangika widhiwidhana panath ketumpatha aanduwa wisin illa askaragath bawa apa warthakaru sandahan kaleya.

thani mahal niwasayakata kanu kipayak athi warandawak ekathu karama hungak lassanata penawa…ee wagema wahalaya mattam kipayakata pala kipayakata yedimen thani mahal niwasa thawath lassana karaganna puluwan.habayi mewata tharamak wadipura mudal wayawena bawa hithe thiyaganna.demahal niwasak gana hina daka daka hitapu obata yam apahasu thawayak nisa thani mahal niwasak thanimata sidu wunoth duk wenna epa…ihatha ma ki krama saha thawath noyek gruhanirmana krama magin itha lassana thani mahal niwasak salasum karanna daksha salasum karuwekuta puluwan.ee nisa hama witama salasumak andawa ganimata pera obe aarthika mattama saha idame swabhawaya pilibandawa salasum shilpiyata danwana.thani mahal niwasakata wayawena mudala men degunayak pamana demahal niwasakata wayawena nisa jiwitha kalayama bageta hadapu demahal niwasaka innawata wada sampurnayen hadagaththu thani mahal niwasaka jiwath wena eka hithata loku sahanayak.aayemath mama kiyanna ooni mama mehema kiyanne aarthika athin api wage samanya madhyama panthika ayata.
